description: This Java class 'UserIntegration' is a JPA entity representing a database table 'user_integrations'. It models the association between a user and an integration, including status, configuration details, and timestamps.

classes.name: UserIntegration
classes.description: JPA entity class for user integrations, containing fields for user reference, integration reference, status, configuration data, and creation timestamp.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the user integration record.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Sets the User object associated with this record.

methods.name: setIntegration
methods.description: Sets the Integration object for this record.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the integration (e.g., connected, revoked).

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Sets the status of the integration.

methods.name: getConfigJson
methods.description: Returns the configuration JSON string, possibly encrypted or serialized token/config data.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the record was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp for the record.
